subject: main.py + manuscript_generation.pyにnarrative_rolesパラメータ伝搬追加
description:
main.py:
1. process_batch_with_fallback_async() (L2002): 引数にnarrative_roles: Dict[int, str] = None追加、内部のprocess_batch_asyncとprocess_individual_code_async呼び出しに伝搬
2. process_batch_async() (L2179): 同じくnarrative_roles引数追加、GenerationConfig生成時にnarrative_roles=narrative_roles or {}, enable_cut_markers=bool(narrative_roles)
3. process_individual_code_async() (L1879): narrative_roles引数追加、GenerationConfig生成時に同様

manuscript_generation.py:
1. ManuscriptRequest (L79)にnarrative_roles: Optional[Dict[int, str]] = None追加
2. generate_all_manuscripts内のprocess_batch_with_fallback_async呼び出し箇所にnarrative_roles=manuscript_request.narrative_rolesを渡す
activeForm: main.py + manuscript_generation.pyにパラメータ伝搬を追加中
